![o995DimD_w1oF4hY-Bfh_G8DBVh7rnbsyMvCnVXzZiE=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/o995DimD_w1oF4hY-Bfh_G8DBVh7rnbsyMvCnVXzZiE=.webp)

Step into Day 5, where **innovation takes center stage**. We're thrilled to announce that **AFFiNE 0.10.0 Stable** is officially live! Dive into a fresh experience by exploring and downloading the stable version. But that's not all accompanying this release is the much-anticipated arrival of the **Pro version**—an opportunity to **amplify your workspace capabilities**. Are you ready to embark on a journey through a realm of advanced features? Picture the possibility of **100GB of cloud storage**. Now, contemplate the advantages of **larger file uploads** and **expanded teamwork capabilities** as we navigate the Pro features. Could this be the perfect moment to elevate your AFFiNE experience?

# Pro Version Launch: Expand Your Capabilities for you and your teammates!

For every user, once you've signed in with your email, you'll begin with the complimentary **free version**. Are you contemplating enhancing your workspace with more advanced features? Our Pro version has officially launched, offering a wealth of features that greatly exceed those of the free edition.

### Increased Cloud Storage

With Pro, you still enjoy the fundamental features of **unlimited local workspaces**, just as you do with the free version. But why stop there? Pro elevates your workspace with a **massive 100GB of cloud storage**, compared to the 10GB you get for free. Imagine the possibilities with ten times the space!

### Larger File Uploads

Need to share larger files? Thanks to AFFiNE cloud, Pro users can now upload per file up to **100MB in size**, leaving the 10MB limit of the free version behind. And when it comes to syncing, Pro offers the same unlimited device sync, ensuring all your work is up-to-date across all devices.


![pl1XsOiK_KRt-7ek54s1NXfNzHY1-yH1uPRPoy7Z6Mk=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/pl1XsOiK_KRt-7ek54s1NXfNzHY1-yH1uPRPoy7Z6Mk=.webp)

### Expanded Teamwork Capabilities

Thinking about teamwork? The Pro version allows up to **10 members in a single workspace**, tripling the capacity of the free version. Now, isn't that an upgrade worth making?

# Take the Leap: Start enjoying the real-time-syncing AFFiNE cloud today!

## A step-by-step tutorial on upgrading to pro effortlessly

Ready for a Seamless Switch to Pro? Dive into a more advanced experience for only **$7.99 monthly** or opt for an **annual plan and save 15%**—why not enjoy a superior service for less at **$6.75 per month**? For our valued Early Access users, we haven't forgotten you – your upgrade to the Pro version comes at **no extra charge**.

Here's how you can transform your account with ease:

**1.Set Your Plan & Make Payment**

Go to **'Pricing Plan'** and decide—monthly or yearly?  Complete the payment and secure your upgraded status. Isn't it quick when it's just a click away? For General Users, simply proceed to payment to secure your Pro upgrade. **For early access users, please follow this guidance**: [https://community.affine.pro/c/insider-general/special-offer-for-early-access-users-claim-your-free-pro-upgrade-now](https://community.affine.pro/c/insider-general/special-offer-for-early-access-users-claim-your-free-pro-upgrade-now)

          </video>

**2.Check Your Status**

Returning to the platform, your status will reflect the new Pro level. Why not explore your payment history and review your basic information now?


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" crossorigin="anonymous" playsinline>
            <source src="https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/Sm40QTLWNUcAtpsqHWFqcvGTDfB_IGUWlOIYU_tdHuw=" type="video/mp4" />

**3.Update Personal Details**

Time to refresh your profile? Update your payment method, add or modify your card details, and download important messages.


<video muted autoplay loop preload="auto" crossorigin="anonymous" playsinline>
            <source src="https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/RyBkhkBUzYf48GHX2CLo4MIPGLvDcHkn5kfOpQF6G0U=" type="video/mp4" />
          </video>

**4.Plan Management**

Need to know when you're next billed or considering a cancellation? You can cancel and resume **auto-renewal anytime**—reinstatement is just as easy. And yes, you can switch from annual to monthly billing; it’s all in your control.

          </video>

Switching to Pro not only expands your capabilities but also aligns with your demand for flexibility and control. Upgrade today—why wait to elevate your experience?

As we wrap up Day 5 of our AFFiNE launch week, the potential unleashed by AFFiNE Pro is truly exhilarating. **It's more than a mere tool**; it serves as a catalyst for **innovation and collaboration**. Seize the power of Pro, and together, let's persist on this transformative journey, elevating your workspace and **magnifying your creative prowess**. Keep an eye out for upcoming updates, inspiration, and a future brimming with expanded possibilities!
